title: Quick and Easy Baked Chicken Fajitas

Ingredients.2: 2 pounds boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips

Ingredients.3: 1 teaspoon garlic granules, or to taste

Ingredients.4: 1 teaspoon chili powder, or to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste

Ingredients.6: 1 pinch ground cumin, or to taste

Ingredients.7: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes for chili

Ingredients.9: 1  green bell pepper, cut into strips, or to taste

Ingredients.10: 1  red bell pepper, cut into strips, or to taste

Ingredients.12: 0.5 teaspoon seasoned salt, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Drizzle 2 tablespoons olive oil over the bottom of a 10x14 glass dish. Add chicken strips.

Directions.3: Combine remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic granules, chili powder, oregano, and cumin in a small bowl. Rub mixture over the chicken. Add tomatoes, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, and green chiles. Mix thoroughly. Sprinkle with seasoned salt.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
